text: For her 20th birthday in 2017, Jenner took to Instagram to reveal that a portion of the proceeds from her massively - successful makeup line would go towards Teen Cancer America, an organization that, according to their website, helps ` ` create state - of - the - art'youth - focused'programs and facilities to meet the needs of teens and young adults with cancer.'' Jenner was inspired by her friend Harry Hudson, himself a cancer survivor, who stated in a video for the organization that Jenner was by his side during his chemo treatments.
